## Using Translation Status Badges

You can display translation status badges using the shortcode:

- Completed: {{< translation-status completed >}}
- In Progress: {{< translation-status in_progress >}}
- Needs Update: {{< translation-status needs_update >}}
- Not Started: {{< translation-status not_started >}}

## Using Translation Links

Display available translations:

{{< translation-links >}}

## Usage in Content Files

To use this extension in your content files, add this to your YAML front matter:

```yaml
filters:
  - translation-status
```

Or install the extension globally in your project.
